articles.author: Melissa Faulner
articles.title: Toyota Brightens the City Streets with New GR86 Yuzu Edition - Toyota USA Newsroom
articles.description: LONG BEACH, Calif. (April 3, 2025) – For 2026, the Toyota sports car lineup is getting brighter with the GR86 Yuzu Edition. This vibrant exterior color is a nod to a memorable special edition of GR86’s predecessor, the Scion FR-S Release Series 1.0.
articles.content:
• Company Announces GR86 Yuzu Edition for 2026
  • GR86 Yuzu Edition Features Exclusive Yuzu Yellow Exterior Color, Black Wheels and a Performance Package

articles.title: Gemini Live rolling out Astra camera, screen sharing to more Android users - 9to5Google
